Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.Controller

Class RoomMover

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.Controller.RoomMover
public class RoomMover extends Object
RoomMover is moving between rooms when called function changeRoom.

  • Constructor Details

    • RoomMover

      public RoomMover(ArrayList<Room> rooms, GamePanel gp)
      it gets starting room via mapSetup and instantiates entities from tuples.
      Parameters:
      rooms - arraylist of rooms of the current level
      gp - parent gamePanel

  • Method Details

    • changeRoom

      public void changeRoom(DirectionsEnum.Directions direction, int newRoomIndex)
      ChangeRoom moves player to a new position based on the direction. Then it loads new map and entities.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction of movement, ex. next room is on the left, LEFT is passed here
      newRoomIndex - the index of the new room we are moving to.
